EmailTemplate.name: Iowa Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop - Des Moines, IA - April 14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pricing and Appraisal Workshop Des Moines, IA Tuesday, April 14, 2015
Thank you for registering for the workshop! Your registration is confirmed.
We will see you on Tuesday, April 14, 2015 at:
Location: Courtyard Des Moines Ankeny 2405 SE Creekview Drive Ankeny, IA 50021 (515) 422-5555
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Des Moines Ankeny, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/dsman-courtyard-des-moines-ankeny/> or call the hotel directly at (515) 422-5555. We look forward to seeing you there!
